title: The Jinx - Part One
description:
True crime returns on Tig and Cheryl, as they watch and react to episodes 1-3 of HBO miniseries "The Jinx." Cheryl tells a spooky story, Tig makes Cheryl do multiple spit takes, and the "tump" debate is settled once and for all. It's a hilarious episode you won't want to miss-- the podcast will return for Part 2 of The Jinx next week! *this episode spills the beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
